library(tidyverse)
library(htmltools)

tribble(
  ~title, ~href,
  "изменение по падежам",   "declension.html",
  "управление глаголов",    "government.html",
  "...",                    "government.html",
  "...",                    "government.html",
  "...",                    "government.html",
  "...",                    "government.html"
) ->
  df

walk2(df$title, df$href, function(title, href){
  h3(title) |> 
    a(href = href) |> 
    div(class = "col") |>
    print()
})
